snippet: Nextdoor.com provides social networks for neighborhoods, offering members a chance to exchange ideas and recommendations with those who live nearby.
abstract: Randall Stross Digital Domain column notes Nextdoor.com provides social networks for neighborhoods, offering members a chance to exchange ideas and recommendations with those who live nearby; notes its service is private, with pages only visible to fellow members.
lead_paragraph: Nextdoor.com provides social networks for neighborhoods, offering members a chance to exchange ideas and recommendations with those who live nearby.

headline.seo: On Nextdoor.com, Social Networks for Neighbors
headline.main: Meet Your Neighbors, if Only Online
headline.print_headline: Meet Your Neighbors, If Only Online
